game.name: Obscurite Magie 3: The Divine Stones
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cialis of the Royal Knights of Alzario is ambushed by an evil group of heretical fanatics that call themselves Regalus. Backed into a corner and on the verge of defeat, she has no choice but to form a pact with the spirit named Myuei to fend off the heretical fanatics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cialis of the Royal Knights of Alzario is ambushed by an evil group of heretical fanatics that call themselves Regalus. Backed into a corner and on the verge of defeat, she has no choice but to form a pact with the spirit named Myuei to fend off the heretical fanatics.
